scripts.collect-data: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/scripts/collectTrainingData.ts
scripts.refresh-token: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/scripts/refreshToken.ts
